inclusion.criterion: Participant is eligible to receive all necessary information about the study and will sign the informed consent.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Detailed plan will be prepared for each participant to schedule the study evaluations to be integrated with the routine examinations.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Baseline neurological, psychological and neurocognitive evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Angio-MRI for carotid stenosis assessment and plaque tissue characterization
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Multigate Doppler (MGD) Investigation of Carotid Artery Stenosis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Wall shear rate and flow separation analysis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Advanced ultrasound techniques for plaque vulnerability and local mechanical properties
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Follow-up (2 years) neurological, psychological and neurocognitive evaluation
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Each participant will be evaluated at baseline and at the 2-year follow-up with a detailed medical history and physical examination.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe comorbidities a priori precluding the 2-year follow-up
exclusion.label: does_not_trigger

exclusion.criterion: Severe allergic diathesis; contraindications to contrast agents for angio-TC or MRI;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Presence of prostheses/implanted electronic devices not suitable for MRI;
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD s/p CABG, EF 60% prior CVA (no residual deficits), HTN, HL, DMII, Moderate to Severe PVD. He reports occasional dizziness and denies CP/SOB.
